name: Impermanence
description:
Impermanence is one of the three characteristics of existence,  according to Buddhism. Reality is never static. Life arises and ceases, that is its nature. Let’s be heedful, not afraid.

Analog single-line drawing and digital illustration.

This artwork was made for SearchLight by NFTs.Tips' Mask Ephemera call for artists for the exhibits during the NFT.NYC Conference to be held November 1-4, 2021.

All rights reserved by the artist.

3840px X 2160px 
by @natalielarrode
